dwc:verbatimLocality: Pinus ponderosa forest, base of "Flatirons", alt. 1,900 m, foothills of Front Range just south of Boul- der (the type locality of A. boulderensis)
dwc:habitat: on arkosic boulders, Pinus ponderosa forest, base of "Flatirons"
dwc:occurrenceRemarks: Lich. Arctoi 90. I860. — Lecanora badiojusca Nyl., Herb. Mus. Fenn. 110. 1859 - Acarospora boulderensis Magn. in Goteb. Kgl. Vet. Handl. F.6, ser. B, 6, No. 7: 16. 1956. — A asperata Magn. l.c. p. 17. — A cal- ifornica Zahlbr. ined. cf. Typus in herb Vienna No. 1026, non Hasse descr. et Isotypus No. 1385 in Bryologist 17: 62. 1914. — A. irregularis Magn., Monogr. Acar. 229. 1929.
